title: Roxane Gay's Brief But Spectacular take on effective ways of being heard
description: Roxane Gay has used writing as a means to untangle and communicate her own trauma since childhood. Now a successful author, professor and mentor to many, she advises young women and aspiring writers on how to harness their voices. Gay shares her Brief But Spectacular take on effective ways of being heard. PBS NewsHour is supported by - https://www.pbs.org/newshour/about/funders
